translations: 质询；要求说明（一般由议员在议会中向内阁部长等提出）

sentences.sentence: Part two. Comparatively study of the interpellation system abroad.
sentences.translation: 第二部分是国外质询制度的比较研究。

sentences.sentence: Some countries have set up procedures for interpellation of maritime liens.
sentences.translation: 有些国家已经建立了海事优先权公示催告程序。

sentences.sentence: Part three. The current situation of interpellation system and together with case study.
sentences.translation: 第三部分是质询制度在我国的实施现状列举并案例分析。
